Source.Name: coquillo
Source.Summary: Coquillo is a multi-platform metadata editor / tagger for various audio file formats. It is based on Qt 4 and TagLib.
Source.Description:
Coquillo is a multi-platform metadata editor / tagger for various audio file formats. It is based on Qt 4 and TagLib.
Basic support for most common file formats including MP3, Ogg, FLAC and MusePack. Supports cover art embedded in MP3, Ogg/Vorbis and FLAC files.
Current features: - CDDB read support. - Integrated FreeDB web search. - Resolve tags from filenames. - Generate filenames from tags. - Process multiple files at once. - Bookmark often used locations.
